dyyl: dunno .. checking by putting finger on it

graphics cards are notoriously bad at saving power. As soon as you enter 3D mode (by loading the driver), it powers the GPU for 3D mode, even if you only use 2D. There is no load-dependent voltage or frequency stepping for the GPU like there is for CPUs.
